text: Gei dolomeenei gei goe gaa kae di haga langaadia, o huaidu la koia e huaidu i nia huaidu o duaahina ahina dela gaa ala be digaula nadau huaidu ai. Malaa, dolomeenei gei goe guu tee, gu lodo huaidu gi do langaadia idimaa goe dela ne hidi ai o duaahina ahina guu ala be digaula e noho madammaa.”
